kchandra423.actors.movingActors.enemies

Class RangedEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • kchandra423.actors.Actor

          • kchandra423.actors.movingActors.enemies.RangedEnemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cyclops, Witch

    public abstract class RangedEnemy
extends Enemy
    Represents an enemy that attacks the player from a range
    Author:
    Kumar Chandra

      • act

        public void act(DrawingSurface d,
                Room r)
        Description copied from class: MovingActor
        Acts based on a few conditions. If this actors health is less than 0, it sets itself as inactive. Then it moves in the x direction. If it collides with an obstacle, it calls the onObstacleCollision method. If it is out of bounds, it immediately moves back into the room. This process is repeated in the y direction. Finally, if this actor interacts with its opponent, it calls the onOpponentInteraction method.
        Overrides:
        act in class Enemy
        Parameters:
        d - The drawing surface to be acted upon
        r - The room the actor is currently in

      • getProjectiles

        Returns:
        this enemies projectiles
